main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted by John F. Stanley while driving near Canadian, Texas on November 2, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2-3 minutes,It was described as circular and approximately 100 feet in diameter,The object emitted a reddish-orange glow and was traveling at an estimated speed of 300-400 mph,No sound was heard during the sighting,The object hovered momentarily before continuing its flight path and disappearing from view.
witness description: John F. Stanley was alone while witnessing the event.
